thread.title: Female IDF soldier injured, Palestinian assailant shot dead
thread.title_full: Female IDF soldier injured, Palestinian assailant shot dead

author: Wires English | Press Trust of India
title: Female IDF soldier injured, Palestinian assailant shot dead
text:
Comments Jerusalem, Oct 8: A Palestinian man who stabbed a female Israeli soldier and three others with a screwdriver was shot dead by security forces in Tel Aviv, hours after a student was critically injured in another incident in Jerusalem. The woman, a member of the Israeli Defense Forces (IDF), was assaulted near the Defence Ministry on Begin Avenue, police said. (Read: Pakistan PM Nawaz Sharif consults aides, ministers ahead of US visit) The assailant was shot dead by security forces after attacking passers-by with a screwdriver opposite the IDF headquarters in Tel Aviv, media reports said. Paramedics said that four people, including the soldier, were lightly wounded in the attack. Police cordoned off Begin junction, one of the busiest junctions in the city, fearing a second attacker might be on the loose. Hours earlier, a Palestinian teenager stabbed a 25-year-old Israeli student before being arrested. The student was rushed to a hospital in critical condition.
